column4: if xsane is missing the help file AND won't open with the full screen on the preview window, and only scans about 40% of the page.. would a fresh install help ? and can someone walk me through doing that please? (adult wih learning disabilities)
there is really not much out there about a broken xsane
is this your first attempt with xsane? or was it working before?
it always worked... sometimes the preview window vanished but it's always worked even when i can't print
well I guess you could try to remove and reinstall.. sudo apt-get remove xsane && sudo apt-get install xsane
before i bite the bullet will i have to tell it how to find the printer again?
yeah it should, it isn't messing with your printer.. It's just an app.  You could also try scanning through gimp
so just replacing xsane should work-work ?
I can't say for sure.. It's worth a try.
should only take a minute or two
do i need to get this?:  Suggested packages:
